title: Booking The Mothers' Room
content:
As we consolidate employees out of Barn G, things are getting cozier. ðŸ˜… This means that room resource booking requires coordination. This is no less the case for the Mothers' Room. If you would like to utilize the lactation area in Barn C, please book the space as you would any other Google Room Resource. What follows is a quick video tutorial for booking this particular resource. The same steps could be applied to any room resource need you might have. [Image]
